definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: At present, a new high-tech zones in front of the watchtower is now the general public.
sentences.chinese: 目前，一個新的高新區的前面崗樓現在一般公衆。

sentences.english: I have more pleasure in a snug farmhouse than a watchtower.
sentences.chinese: 我對一座整潔的農舍比對一座崗樓更感興趣。
